alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 4:57AM CDT until July 26 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Juneau County in central Wisconsin... Southern Adams County in central Wisconsin... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 457 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mauston, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Juneau and southern Adams Counties, including the following locations... County Roads B And P, Dells Timberland Campground, County Roads B And K, The Town Of Quincy, Johnson Hill, Lyndon Station and Stand Rock Campground. This includes Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 59 and 86. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
